comments.body:
Won't this cause the Xcode project itself to be built in Debug mode? That would be very problematic for at least one early adopter. (Specifically, it prevents anyone from having debug/release behavior changes in the native Runner code, which I know some users rely on.)

I'd like to have `--release` still be available, but just use the debug framework for now.
No, this only controls how the kernel is built. The xcode release mode is set below on L57, and in the generated xcconfig
